summary: The module offers generic time‑handling helpers used throughout the flow and water‑quality components, such as converting inputs to list form, extracting start dates from forcing datasets, and merging package‑specific timestamps into a consolidated, unique time series.
business_intent: Supply a central, reusable set of time‑management utilities that support consistent time discretization and package scheduling in hydrological and water‑quality simulations, while avoiding circular dependencies.
